title: And the Next Story Is...
author: JGray
text:
As our story here continues, poor Mandrake seems to be in a bit of a bind! What will happen to her? Will the goblins eat her?

So every knows, our next story will involve none of our regular cast but will instead be a seven to ten page adventure staring a certain elf and a certain gunslinger who showed up back in chapter 5...

See everyone Monday!

replies.author: JD*Guest*
replies.text: I guess up wasn't an option. Having a metal arm like that could be awkward when scratching one's behind.
